physical_appearance: This is a multicoloured flag chart of the seafaring nations created by Matthaus Seutter and printed by Tobias Lotter. The title of the chart can be seen in two lines of text in German at the top of the chart. A single line of text also appears on top of each of the 139 flags represented in the chart. There is also one line of text centralised at the bottom of the chart, beneath all the flags.
sgcool_label_text: This 18th century flag chart illustrates the flags of 139 seafaring nations. It was published by Tobias Lotter, based on the work of his father-in-law Georg Matthaus Seutter.
title_text: Matthaus Seutter's Flag Chart of the Seafaring Nations printed by Tobias Lotter
techniques_name: papermaking copper engraving (printing process) hand coloring
